verses.name: 2 Kings 22:14
verses.text: So Hilkiah the priest, and Ahikam, and Achbor, and Shaphan, and Asahiah, went unto Huldah the prophetess, the wife of Shallum the son of Tikvah, the son of Harhas, keeper of the wardrobe; (now she dwelt in Jerusalem in the college;) and they communed with her.

verses.name: 2 Kings 22:15
verses.text: And she said unto them, Thus saith the Lord God of Israel, Tell the man that sent you to me,

verses.name: 2 Kings 22:16
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord, Behold, I will bring evil upon this place, and upon the inhabitants thereof, even all the words of the book which the king of Judah hath read:
